page.title: 02FARMING INTRODUCTION
page.content: In our 4km x 3km block,farming is the only 'industry' carried out.Within our area,we have seven farms as we know them and one croft. For the Doomsday Project, we looked closely at four of the farms. Their methods and products have changed little apart from the growing of barley. Growing of winter barley began four years ago. Spring sown barley, we think, has been grown over the last fifteen years. Before this, root crops, particularly turnips, were grown. This died out about twenty years ago.
